20101207181442.667|20101207181444.333|CCO|THINGS STAND WITH YESTERDAY'S 
20101207181444.333|20101207181446.000|CCO|HEARING, THIS DISCUSSION ABOUT 
20101207181446.000|20101207181447.667|CCO|STANDING, THE FACT THAT YOU ARE

20101207181507.000|20101207181509.000|CCO|IN A QUITE PREDICTABLE WAY.

20101207182153.000|20101207182155.000|CCO|SHE WAS EARNING $60,000 A YEAR.
20101207182155.000|20101207182157.000|CCO|HER PARTNER, KEVIN WALLACE, WAS
